description:
This innovative action shooter uses the camera to turn your surroundings into the playing environment! Truly unique and totally physical, 360 degrees of intensity, System Flaw: Recruit is the future of handheld gaming excitement. You have been chosen to take part in the most arduous training program to combat the threat we call the Flaw.

Please note that elements of this software may have been featured in previously released software.
name: System Flaw: Recruit
